name: The Escapists (itch)
description:
Game realized for the 5th Driftwood Game Jam. More details about it there: https://itch.io/jam/5adj

The game has been realized with RPG Maker MV without plugins - as an added challenge. This is the tale of a man devoted to the cause of his country which will see his life change after encountering a woman trying to escape.

This game can be finished in less than 30 minutes if you know what you are doing, but it holds a lot of secrets I hope you will enjoy. How you will play the game is up to you!

Have fun!
